kit.leader_skill: All Types Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +50%

super_attack.name: Power Pole, Extend!
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK and raises DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy

passive_skill.name: Adapting to the Environment
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) ATK & DEF 150% up; (Forever) All allies' Ki +2 and ATK 40% up and if there is another "Dragon Ball Seekers" Category ally attacking in the same turn, plus an additional Ki +1 and chance of performing a critical hit 20% up; (Forever) Launches an additional Super Attack; (Forever) Medium chance of performing a critical hit; For every attack performed: (Forever) ATK & DEF 30% up (up to 150%); (Forever) Chance of performing a critical hit 10% up (up to 50%)

lines.text: All allies' Ki +2 and ATK 40% up and if there is another "Dragon Ball Seekers" Category ally attacking in the same turn, plus an additional Ki +1 and chance of performing a critical hit 20% up
Medium chance of performing a critical hit
Chance of performing a critical hit 10% up (up to 50%)

variants.variant_label: [Companion from the Old Days] Goku (Mini) (DAIMA)  Base
